root.message: The QUALITY_ASSURE field for indicator 5-a-2, translated into all languages

languages.language: The assessment of laws is initially carried out by national counterparts, and legal practitioners in the relevant areas of law (land, land registration, land programmes, matrimonial property, inheritance, quota’s ensuring women’s participation in land administration and management bodies, for all types of land -including agrarian, customary, housing-). The data is checked and verified by the FAO. The data is then sent to the designated focal points/country counterparts to review and validate. Please refer to section 3 above on Data source type and data collection method for more details.
